file_content.text: Our bioweapon's safe, and the Republic's fuming--truly a wonderful day on Balmorra.
The spy was dead when I found him. He hid the bioweapon, but I dug it up.
Poor Republic--all that trouble for nothing.
At any rate, congratulations. I'll include a full description of your heroics in my report.
Now if you'll excuse me--I must see to the bioweapon's safe transport off Balmorra.
The Empire invested years in this bioweapon. We can't lose it now.
I'm honored, my lord--and grateful. We've suffered a security breach, and Sith help would be most welcome.
Captain Jaggard, sir. Good to have you. We've suffered a security breach and could use your assistance with our cover-up.
Just the hunter I was hoping to see. I have a top secret contract that requires your talents.
I'd prefer our security breach be known to as few as possible, but discretion's worth less than your combined talents.
Exactly fifty-two minutes ago, a Republic spy infiltrated an Imperial capital ship.
The blast-happy scum killed sixteen loyal officers and made off with a sample of our most deadly bioweapon.
Now this spy's on Balmorra, trying to hand the weapon off to the Republic. We must recover it first.
The Empire's property will not fall into Republic hands.
I'll retrieve your bioweapon.
When he shows his face, I'll blast it and grab your poison.
I'll get your bioweapon.
Thank you. This subterfuge must be punished--starting with the spy.
This will be too easy.
Don't underestimate this spy.
He crash-landed in the swamp. Republic search parties are moving in, but the real problem is the wildlife--Balmorra's nastiest man-eaters.
Also... be careful with the bioweapon itself. The casing might be damaged, and I'd rather not have to explain a thousand unplanned casualties.
I don't care. [Refuse quest]
I see. Well, forget I even mentioned the bioweapon. It doesn't exist.
I'm sorry--my business is classified.
